original_text:
David fastened on his sword over the tunic and tried walking around, because he was not used to them.
“I cannot go in these,” he said to Saul, “because I am not used to them.” So he took them off.
korean_text: 다윗이 칼을 군복 위에 차고는 익숙하지 못하므로 시험적으로 걸어 보다가 사울에게 말하되 익숙하지 못하니 이것을 입고 가지 못하겠나이다 하고 곧 벗고

sentences.original_text: David fastened on his sword over the tunic
because he was not used to them
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그는 그것들에 익숙하지 않았기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: "because I am not used to them."
